home.title: Senior Software Engineer
home.description: Results-driven developer with 8+ years of experience mastering both frontend and backend technologies. Recently promoted to Senior Developer at Deliverect, where I build sophisticated analytics platforms using React/Next.js and Python/FastAPI while mentoring team members and architecting scalable solutions.
home.ctaDescription: I'm always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities to be part of your visions.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Senior Software Engineer with expertise in full-stack development
about.professionalDescription1: Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience specializing in modern JavaScript frameworks and full-stack development. My expertise spans frontend technologies like React, Next.js, and Angular, complemented by backend work with Python, FastAPI, and various database systems.
about.professionalDescription2: Recently promoted at Deliverect, I contribute to both frontend and backend development of the analytics platform, implement technical best practices, and mentor junior developers. My approach combines technical excellence with pragmatic problem-solving to deliver scalable, maintainable solutions.
about.professionalDescription3: In 2024, I started my own software consultancy, working on specialized solutions for university clients in the chemical engineering sector.
about.technicalLeadershipDesc: Provide technical guidance to team members, conduct thorough code reviews, and help set architectural direction for complex projects while driving quality standards.
about.enterpriseDesignSystemsDesc: Spearheaded development of company-wide design systems, standardizing components and improving development workflows.
about.mentorshipDesc: Mentored multiple junior developers, helping them grow their technical skills through hands-on guidance and structured learning paths.
about.entrepreneurshipDesc: Applied technical expertise to start a small software consultancy focused on specialized industry solutions.
about.getInTouchDescription: I'm always interested in hearing about new opportunities and projects. Feel free to reach out if you'd like to discuss potential collaboration.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: A collection of projects I've worked on

metadata.title: Alexei Bostan - Senior Software Engineer
metadata.description: Senior Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience specializing in frontend and backend technologies including React, Next.js, Python, and FastAPI.
